title: Client Lag!!
body: Not sure if anyone else is having major client lag when navigating or just logging in. Please help never happened since recent update!

replies.body: Try turning on the "Low Spec Mode" within the client and see if that helps. If it doesn't, your computer is just not powerful enough to run the League client smoothly.
^ This guy knows what's up! Try turning that "Low Spec" option on in the client options and let us know if that helps ^_^
